block.p: Claire Campbell Blaydon, the daughter of Carol Sprague Blaydon of Sag Harbor, N.Y., and Prof. Colin C. Blaydon of Hanover, N.H., was married yesterday to Anthony Angelo Florence Jr., a son of Marilyn Hospodar of Wexford, Pa., and Mr. Florence of Pittsburgh. The Rev. William P. Gallagher performed the ceremony at Our Lady of the Snows Roman Catholic Church in Woodstock, Vt.

The bride will continue to use her name professionally. She is a fashion designer specializing in women's knitwear and the owner of a boutique in New York that bears her name. She graduated from Bennington College. Her mother, who is retired, taught child development at Lyndon B. Johnson High School in Austin, Tex. Her father, a professor of management at the Amos Tuck School of Business at Dartmouth College in Hanover and the director of its John H. Foster Center for Private Equity, is a former dean of the school.

Claire Campbell Blaydon, the daughter of Carol Sprague Blaydon of Sag Harbor, N.Y., and Prof. Colin C. Blaydon of Hanover, N.H., was married yesterday to Anthony Angelo Florence Jr., a son of Marilyn Hospodar of Wexford, Pa., and Mr. Florence of Pittsburgh. The Rev. William P. Gallagher performed the ceremony at Our Lady of the Snows Roman Catholic Church in Woodstock, Vt.

The bride will continue to use her name professionally. She is a fashion designer specializing in women's knitwear and the owner of a boutique in New York that bears her name. She graduated from Bennington College. Her mother, who is retired, taught child development at Lyndon B. Johnson High School in Austin, Tex. Her father, a professor of management at the Amos Tuck School of Business at Dartmouth College in Hanover and the director of its John H. Foster Center for Private Equity, is a former dean of the school.

The bridegroom is an associate in the investment banking division of Morgan Stanley Dean Witter in New York. He graduated from Dartmouth, from which he also received an M.B.A. degree. His mother is a psychologist in Pittsburgh. His father is the senior vice president for corporate marketing and investor relations of the Avenex Corporation, a designer and marketer of fiber optic products in Fremont, Calif. The bridegroom is a stepson of Gail Florence and Robert Hospodar.
